Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here are the bride and groom!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You may kiss the bride...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dearly beloved! We have witnessed the
joining of a new husband and wife!
<PAGE>
Let us send them off into their new life
with a loud round of applause!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll send you musical blessings to
commemorate your wedding. Here you are!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Allen.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allen. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. I promise to love <MYNAME>
forever.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Allen to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You both look so lovely! Be happy!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your wedding. Your
wedding clothes look so... so lovely.
Please be happy.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your wedding. You are
both so lovely, you make the perfect
couple. Be happy together!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, congrats to you both! Care for and
respect each other always, okay?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Isn't it great, <MYNAME>? Having all these
people here for us! I'm happy too.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Rod.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rod. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. It's me and you forever,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Rod to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Rod, <MYNAME>. Congrats. You two stay
happy now!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made a lovely bride, <MYNAME>. I hope
you'll be very happy!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey! You two make a fine couple! You may
fight a little, just make sure you make
up afterward.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Rod, you look so much cooler than you
normally do! I know <MYNAME> is going to
make you really happy!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Isn't it great, having everyone here
celebrating for us? I'll never forget
today!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Soseki.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Soseki. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. I will treasure her forever.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Soseki to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Be happy!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm sure you'll make a wonderful home
together. You'll be happy forever.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you'd better make Soseki happy!
I'm counting on you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A lovely ceremony. I'm so glad I was
able to take part. My best wishes to you
both.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
It's great having everyone here, all
celebrating for us, eh? <MYNAME>, thank
you for marrying me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Sanjay.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sanjay. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do. Our lives will be intertwined
forever from now on.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Sanjay to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations to you both, <MYNAME>,
Sanjay! I hope you'll be very happy
together!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, both of you. Sanjay,
I hope you'll be very happy. <MYNAME>,
please look after him for me.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations to you both. I hope
you'll be very happy.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you are so lovely! I know you
and Sanjay will make a lovely home
together.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
We're blessed, to have so many people
turn out for us like this. I'm sure I'll
never forget this day.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Neil.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Neil. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Of course I do. I will love only you, 
<MYNAME>, and be with you forever.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Neil to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Neil, <MYNAME>, congratulations!  May
you be happy forever!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on your wedding! You two make
a great couple. Keep each other happy,
you hear?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad that it's you two getting
married. Get along well!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations to you both. I know
you'll be happy together!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
It's a little embarrassing, but it's
great to have so many people celebrating
with us. I'm so happy.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Amir.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Amir. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. We will now live together,
<MYNAME>. I'll treasure you forever.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Amir to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You both look so lovely.
Congratulations. I hope your happiness
will last forever.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations. Master Amir, Miss
<MYNAME>, I hope you'll both be very
happy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You finally married your prince! How
lovely. I know you'll be happier than
the princess in any book, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hyah hah hah. I'm almost jealous, you
look so happy. It almost makes me want
to get married myself.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That dress
looks so lovely on you. You look so
beautiful!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_WEDDING>
This has been the perfect wedding
ceremony. I'm so happy. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Tina.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Tina to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tina. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. I will love and be with you
forever, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Tina. I hope <MYNAME>
will make you very happy!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations. Master <MYNAME>, Miss
Tina, I hope you'll both be very happy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tina, you look so cute! You look like
a prince and princess. I know you'll be
very happy together.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You two make a lovely couple. Try not to
fight too much, okay?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I'm so happy to have everyone here,
celebrating with us. <MYNAME>, thank you
for marrying me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Michelle.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Michelle to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Michelle. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do.<RED>∀</RED> I will love you forever,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You both look so lovely! Be happy!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Michelle, <MYNAME>. You both look... Look
so happy. Congratulations on your
wedding.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Keep each other happy, you hear? You
have my heartfelt congratulations.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe you're the one who gets
to marry Michelle, <MYNAME>! She's so
popular, after all. Congratulations!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy... all
thanks to you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Yuri.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Yuri to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yuri. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
...I do. I will be with you forever,
<MYNAME>. I will love you forever.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Make a happy
home together.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on your wedding!<RED>∀</RED> You make a
lovely bride, Yuri. I wish you both
eternal happiness.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yuri, I know <MYNAME> will take good care
of you. Be happy together!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You look so lovely, Yuri, and <MYNAME>!
Wow! How cool do you look? I hope you'll
be real happy!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Thank you for.. for being so kind. I'll
never forget today.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Iroha.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Iroha to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Iroha. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes, I do. I will be you with forever,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. I'm sure you'll
be very happy together.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Iroha, you look so lovely. <MYNAME>, I
know you're going to be very happy. You
lucky thing!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey! You two make a fine couple! Make a
happy home together.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A lovely ceremony. I'm so glad I was
able to take part. I hope you'll be
happy forever.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Having so many people celebrate my
becoming <MYNAME>'s wife... I'm so happy!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Felicity.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Felicity to be your
lawfully wedded wife, in both sickness
and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Felicity. Do you take <MYNAME> to be your
lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do. I will love you forever, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Felicity, you look so beautiful! <MYNAME>,
you'd better make her happy!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at you with your lovely young wife.
I'm quite jealous! Congratulations.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You are perfectly suited to each other.
I hope you'll be happy forever.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Felicity, you look lovely! I know <MYNAME>
will make you very happy.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I'll never forget today as long as I
live!  <MYNAME>, thank you for taking me
as your wife.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here
today to celebrate the wedding of <MYNAME>
and Witch Princess.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you take Witch Princess to be
your lawfully wedded wife, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
her, and to walk hand-in-hand with her
through your new life together?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Witch Princess. Do you take <MYNAME> to
be your lawfully wedded husband, in both
sickness and in health?
<PAGE>
Do you swear to love and think only of
him, and to walk hand-in-hand with him
through your new life together?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do. I'll be with you forever, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations to you both. May your
smiles never fade.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations to you both. I hope you
make a warm, loving family.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hope you'll be very happy.
Just like me and my lovely wife!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, congrats to you both! I hope you'll
be happy forever.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! My heartfelt
congratulations, <MYNAME>. What a
wonderful wedding this is!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I may have my issues with you, but
<MYNAME> does so much for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Let us call a truce for today. We don't
want to ruin something as special as a
wedding, do we?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. That tuxedo
really suits you. You look so cool!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. You look so happy. Today is all
about you, so make the most of it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
It isn't so bad, having all these people
coming together to celebrate for us.
This has been a very special day.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Phew! We're finally home.
<PAGE>
It's great that the wedding ceremony
turned into a celebration party, but
that's a lot for activity one day.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
We're finally alone.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I almost forgot.
<PAGE>
Now we're married, rather than the name
I called you when we were dating, do you
want me to call you something else?
Change name used by spouse
Everything's fine as it is

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Go on then, think of a name. Any name is
okay!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay?
Yes
No

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. Okay.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We need to decide a few things about our
life together from tomorrow, too.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you've got your hands full with
the farm, so I... I can handle the
housework.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I would be perfectly happy with that
arrangement, but okay.
<PAGE>
If you really want to do something, I

Phew. I'm exhausted. We're finally home.
<PAGE>
It's fine that the wedding ceremony
turned into a celebration party, but it
feels like we've been out for a year!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
We're finally alone. I'm so happy!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We need to decide a few things about our
life together from tomorrow, sweet
thing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, I want you to do all the
housework. How does that sound to you?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? I have to do chores as well?
That's not quite what I was expecting.
<PAGE>
We could take it in turns to make the
meals, then? I'll do it when you really
don't have time.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Breakfast will be between <BLUE>6 and
8 AM</BLUE>, lunch between <BLUE>noon and 2 PM</BLUE>
and dinner between <BLUE>7 and 9 PM</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
If you want to eat with me, go ahead 
and search the table over there during
these times.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We can decide then if I will make it or
if you want to make it, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
If we aren't going to eat together then
we can both get our own meals.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Also, I'll do what I can to help you
out. When I feel like it.
<PAGE>
Picking up items from the river and
forest should be easy enough. I can do
that if you like?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, okay. But I'm not going to help
you all the time. Just Saturday and
Sunday, understand?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, you make this so easy! If you need
any help with anything just talk to me
on the <BLUE>day before</BLUE>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
One other thing. I hope you appreciate
this, <MYNAME>! I'm going to get up early
with you from now on.
<PAGE>
As we're going to be living together
from now on, that will probably be more
convenient.
<PAGE>
I think that covers everything. Looking
forward to starting our new life
together!
